abstract: Senate Democrats and the House impeachment managers privately say they are more interested in Mick Mulvaney, the acting White House chief of staff.
lead_paragraph: As discussion of possible witnesses heats up in the Capitol, there continues to be a widespread misconception about whom precisely Democrats most want to hear from at President Trumpâ€™s trial.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
